net.unicon.cas.addons.ticket.expiration

Class IpAddressBasedExpirationPolicyEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.unicon.cas.addons.ticket.expiration.IpAddressBasedExpirationPolicyEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TicketExpirationPolicyEvaluator

    public class IpAddressBasedExpirationPolicyEvaluator
extends Object
implements TicketExpirationPolicyEvaluator
    An extension of the TicketExpirationPolicyEvaluator that is able to determine whether the remote address of the incoming request matches a particular IP pattern. The pattern may be specified as regular expression that is compiled and run against the remote address. The retrieval of the remote IP address may be provided via IPv6 or IPv4 syntax.

    NOTE: If you prefer to configure the pattern by IPv4 syntax only, add the -Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true flag to your JAVA_OPTS environment variable prior to restarting the container.

    Since:
    1.9
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
    See Also:
    CompositeTicketGrantingTicketExpirationPolicy
